effect.short: Raises the user's Attack, Defense, and accuracy by one stage each.
effect.full: Raises the user's Attack, Defense, and accuracy by one stage each.

flavorTexts.text:
The user coils up and concentrates. This raises its
Attack and Defense stats as well as its accuracy.
